titleNullable: One Piece IMDb Episode Info and Rating
subtitleNullable: First 1077 One Piece episodes' number, title, plot, date and rating.
descriptionNullable:
**About Dataset**
This dataset contains general and rating information about the latest One Piece episodes (first 1077), available through IMDb's website. This dataset was created by downloading and scraping the html file of the page containing the information of all of the episodes in October 10, 2023.

**Content:**
index
Episode Number: The number of the episode.
Title: The title of the episode.
Plot: The episode's plot/synopsis.
Date: The release date of the episode.
Rating: The average rating of the episode at the date the dataset was created.

**Dataset Information:**
Size: 262KB
Format: CSV
Columns: 5 + index
Rows: 1077 + header

The data has been scraped for educational and research purposes only and done responsibly by downloading the page once. Thanks to IMDb for providing this information.

**Data source:** 
https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0388629/episodes/?season=1
